snippet: SIEGEL--Jerome. The Board of Directors and the members of Quaker Ridge Golf Club are saddened by the passing of our beloved friend and esteemed member of more than 35 years, Jerome Siegel. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his family in their time of sorrow. Marc Friedman, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome. The Board of Directors and the members of Quaker Ridge Golf Club are saddened by the passing of our beloved friend and esteemed member of more than 35 years, Jerome Siegel. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his family in their time of sorrow. Marc Friedman, President 1/3
